about_the_game:
Prepare for a spine-tingling showdown in the untamed wilderness of the old west with Cowboy Vs Zombiesl. Step into the boots of a lone prospector as you awaken to the bone-chilling sounds of chaos emanating from the depths of a mine shaft. The once-quiet frontier town is now overrun by hordes of ravenous zombies, and it's up to you to survive until the cavalry arrives.

In this thrilling fusion of roguelike, first-person, and third-person gameplay, every decision you make matters.Explore the surrounding area for valuable resources and other survivors. Armed with your trusty six-shooter and a pickaxe, confront the relentless zombie onslaught in intense shootouts that require nerves of steel.

Cowboy Vs Zombies combines tower defense mechanics with the high-stakes action of survival gameplay. Strategically fortify your position within the old fort using your wits to outsmart the relentless undead. The clock is ticking, and the frontier is unforgiving, so make every move count!

Key Features:
  • A captivating blend of roguelike, first-person, and third-person survival gameplay.
  • Immersive exploration of a frontier mining town and a long-forgotten fort.
  • Tower defense mechanics that challenge your strategic thinking.
  • Intense shootouts with hordes of zombies in a unique Old West setting.
  • Save other survivors, or see them be eaten by the zombies.
  • Craft and scavenge resources to fortify your defenses and prolong survival.
  • An ever-changing missions for endless replayability.
  • Will you survive the relentless undead horde until the cavalry arrives?
In Cowboy Vs Zombies, every playthrough is a fresh, nerve-wracking adventure. How long can you hold out against the relentless tide of the undead in this dynamic and challenging roguelike experience? Strap on your six-shooter, gather your courage, and take your place in the ultimate showdown on the frontier. It's survival of the fittest, cowboy style!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (e.g., Intel Core i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU with at least 1GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU (e.g., Intel Core i5 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible GPU with at least 2GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
